about_the_game:
Includes three exclusive skins for Sylas’s Unchained Mode. Content includes:
  • Crimson Sylas Skin
  • Fallen Sylas Skin
  • Prismatic Sylas Skin

All three skins will unlock after the Sacred Woods mission. Equip the skins in the Settings menu.

The Unchained Skins Pack is included with the The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story™ Deluxe Edition.
detailed_description:
Includes three exclusive skins for Sylas’s Unchained Mode. Content includes:
  • Crimson Sylas Skin
  • Fallen Sylas Skin
  • Prismatic Sylas Skin

All three skins will unlock after the Sacred Woods mission. Equip the skins in the Settings menu.

The Unchained Skins Pack is included with the The Mageseeker: A League of Legends Story™ Deluxe Edition.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Quad Q6600 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 550 Ti 1 GB / Intel Iris Plus / AMD HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-750 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 650 Ti 1 GB / AMD HD 6770
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Additional Notes: 4K @ 60FPS: Intel i5-750 / AMD A8-6600K, 8GB RAM, GeForce GTX 660Ti 3 GB / AMD Radeon R9 280x / Intel Arc A380

short_description: Includes three exclusive skins for Sylas’s Unchained Mode: Crimson Sylas Skin, Fallen Sylas Skin, and Prismatic Sylas Skin. All three skins will unlock after the Sacred Woods mission. Equip the skins in the Settings menu.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Korean*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil*, Russian, Simplified Chinese*, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
